name: Cybercity Delivery Service
description:
The ultimate cyberpunk delivery experience presents you with a deep moral choice - will you rush the package to its destination or will you chill out and enjoy the beautiful semi-procedurally generated utopian neon-landscape. Use your trusty city-speedster to deliver goods and services from town to town, be it from their rooftops or their doorsteps . Or just explore the boundaries of 3D flight, fully developed in Unreal Engine 5.

Keyboard Inputs:
Accelerate: Spacebar
Brake: Ctrl
Up/Left/Down/Right: WASD
Camera: Mouse

Controller Inputs:
Accelerate: Right Trigger
Brake: Left Trigger
Up/Left/Down/Right: Left Joystick
Camera: Right Joystick

Escape to quit, or if you get stuck.

Enjoy and I hope you have some fun 5 minutes :D
